tool_description: This API returns Inflation Rate around the world... with the current inflation and the previous inflation,,,
title: Inflation Rate Around the World

api_list.name: Get Inflation Data from G20
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve all the inflation Data only for G20 countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://inflation-rate-around-the-world.p.rapidapi.com/g20"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inflation-rate-around-the-world.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Inflation Data WorldWide
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Data on Inflation Around the World
api_list.code:

url = "https://inflation-rate-around-the-world.p.rapidapi.com/world"

headers = {
